name: Genuine Stone Ground Whole White Wheat Flour
description: White Whole Wheat Flour is 100% whole grain and stone-ground to provide the natural nutrition of traditional whole wheat with the taste and texture of white flour. This flour is ideal for your favorite bread recipes, pastries, rolls, pancakes, tortillas and more. Whole wheat flour made from hard white wheat is flavor-rich, naturally sweet and golden amber in color. Used in baked goods such as breads, tortillas, or pizza crust. Combines the healthy benefits of wheat fiber with a mild flavor.
